metadata.name: Heavy Metal #316
metadata.description:
[Read Comic](https://0x6e02e27f03ae982a3de019bcdb01aef3ca8a91e0.mintgate.io/go/4ID26zK33uE2/) 

Heavy Metal #316 is our 45th anniversary issue! To celebrate, we've got wild new stories featuring iconic Heavy Metal characters, including the cosmic warrior Taarna and Nelson, the zombie gunner. This issue brings together talents from around the world, including a cover by the legendary artist Simon Bisley (interviewed within). Writers: various, including Helen Mullane, Joe Trohman, Steve Orlando, Joe Harris, Matthew Medney, Marko Stojanovic, and more. Artists: various, including Montos, Kim Jung Gi, Ivan Shavrin, Vassilis Gogtzilas, Scott Koblish, and Boris Bakliza.
